faqAnswers.resetPasswordAnswer: Wobetumi ayɛ wo password foforɔ denam anammɔn yi so:
resetPasswordSteps: Kɔ login krataafa so na pɛ "Password a me werɛ afi"
Kyerɛw email a ɛka wo akɔnt ho
Hwɛ wo email mu password foforɔyɛ link
Pɛ link no so na di akwankyerɛ so na yɛ password foforɔ
faqAnswers.resetPasswordNote: Sɛ woannya email no a, hwɛ wo spam folder mu.
faqAnswers.matchingAlgorithmAnswer: Yɛn mpatafuo nhyehyɛeɛ nim de nneɛma pii de wo ne nnipa a mo hyia:
matchingAlgorithmFactors: Wo aware pɛ (mfeɛ, kwan, ne nneɛma foforo)
Anigyedeɛ ne gyidie a mo kyɛ
Mpatafuo susudeɛ a egyina wo ho nsɛm so
Nea mo pɛ mo ho nsɛnkyerɛnne
faqAnswers.matchingAlgorithmNote: Sɛ wo ho nsɛm yɛ ma a, mpatafuo a yɛbɛma wo no bɛyɛ papa.
faqAnswers.updateLocationAnswer: Wo baabi yɛ foforɔ ankasa berɛ a wode app no di dwuma. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wosesa wo baabi wo ankasa a:
updateLocationSteps: Kyerɛw wo baabi foforɔ anaa ma baabi ho kwan
faqAnswers.updateLocationNote: Adwo: Baabi nneɛma bi betumi ahia premium adetɔ.
faqAnswers.reportBehaviorAnswer: Yɛde afodefoɔ ahobammɔ ayɛ titire. Sɛ wobɛbɔ obi ho amanneɛ a:
reportBehaviorSteps: Kɔ odwumadini no ho nsɛm so
Pɛ nkentemmuo mmiɛnsa (⋮) wɔ atifi nifa hɔ
Paw adwo a wobɔ amanneɛ no ho na ma ho nsɛm
faqAnswers.reportBehaviorNote: Yɛn hwɛfo kuo hwɛ amanneɛbɔ nyinaa yiye na wɔyɛ nea ɛfata.

guideContent.meetDescription: Ne awade a wɔkyɛ Ghana abedeɛ denam amanaman mpatafuo so
guideContent.heatDescription: Kɔ nkasaeɛ ne manfo dwumadie a ɛwɔ berɛ ankasa amanaman nneɛma mu
guideContent.suiteDescription: Yɛ adwumayɛfo nkitahodi wɔ Ghana aguadibea manfo mu
quickSetupSteps: Wie wo ho nsɛm de mfonini nokware ne adansedie
Si wo aware pɛ ne anigyedeɛ de nsunsuansoɔ papa
Paw wo titire adwene: Aware, Manfo, anaa Adwumayɛfo nkitahodi
Ma baabi dwumadi na anya nkitahodi ne hwehwɛ wɔ wo mpɔtam
Fi ase swipe, kasa, anaa yɛ nkitahodi sɛnea wo kwan no teɛ
essentialFeaturesList: Mpatafuo Nim: AI mpatafuo a egyina amanaman, gyidie ne anigyedeɛ so
Sunsum Kwan: Hwɛ ho nsɛm wɔ kokoamoa mu a worenhu wo
Asɛm Kyɛ: Kyɛ wo da mu nsɛm ne manfo
Amanaman Nsunsuansoɔ: Hu nnipa a wofi Ghana abusuakuw anaa mpɔtam pɔtee mu
firstMessageTips: Ka biribi a ɛfa wɔn ho nsɛm ho (kyerɛ anigyedeɛ nokware)
Bisa nsɛm fa wɔn anigyedeɛ anaa suahu ho sen sɛ woka "wo ho te sɛn" kɛkɛ
Kyɛ biribi a ɛfa wo ho na afi nkasaeɛ a afaafa mmienu ayɛ ase
Fa nsereɛ di dwuma sɛnea ɛfata, nanso kwati nsereɛ a ɛyɛ fufuo anaa nea ɛyɛ wo ankasa dodo
Yɛ no tiawa nanso dwene ho na twetwe adwene
advancedFeaturesList: Kenkan Adie Si: Hu berɛ a wɔkenkan nkrasɛm na anya nkasaeɛ papa
Nne Nkrasɛm: Soma nne clips na anya nkitahodi a ɛyɛ wo ankasa
Mfonini Kyɛ: Kyɛ berɛ mu nsɛm wɔ nkasaeɛ mu tee
Nkrasɛm a Ɛyera Ankasa: Si nkrasɛm sɛ ɛnyera na anya kokoamoa
Kyerɛw Nkyerɛkyerɛ: Berɛ ankasa nkasaeɛ ne nkitahodi dwumadi
conversationDos: Fa nidi ne ntoboa di dwuma
Kɔ video frɛyɛ so berɛ a wotee
conversationDonts: Hyɛ obi so sɛ ɔnkyɛ ne ho nsɛm
photoTips: Titire Mfonini: Anim mfonini a ɛyɛ pɛ ne anim hann amoa ne sereeɛ nokware
Nipadua Nyinaa Mfonini: Nipadua nyinaa mfonini a ɛkyerɛ wo ho mfonini ne wo su
Dwumadi Mfonini: Wo reyɛ biribi a wopɛ (anigyedeɛ, agodie, akwantuo)
Nkuran Mfonini: Wo ne nnamfo/abusuafo (kyerɛ sɛ wo ne nnipa di nkitahodi)
Amanaman Mfonini: Di Ghana amanneɛ anaa dwumadie
Adwumayɛ Mfonini: Ma SUITE nkitahodi ne aguadi nkitahodi
bioTips: Fi ase de nea ɛma wo yɛ soronko (suban anaa anigyedeɛ)
Ka wo Ghana abedeeɛ ne nea ɛkyerɛ ma wo
Fa anigyedeɛ anaa dwumadi 2-3 a ɛyɛ pɔtee ka ho
Fa nkasaeɛ mfiase anaa nsɛm ka ho
Yɛ anigye na yɛ nokware (kwati nsɛm bɔne)
Fa emoji kakra bi di dwuma na anya anim hann ne suban
profileCompletionList: Hyɛ afaafa nyinaa mu (100% wieeɛ kɔ mpatafuo 40% soro)
Ka wo amanaman nkitahodi na anya mfonini ne suban pii
Fa wo dwom nhyehyɛeɛ ka ho na kyerɛ wo dwom anigyedeɛ
Si baabi pɔtee ne aware mfeɛ
Yɛ foforɔ berɛ nyinaa de mfonini foforɔ ne suahu

safetyGuide.safetyPrivacySubtitle: Tena ahobammɔ so berɛ a woreyɛ nkitahodi nokware
privacyControls: Sunsum Kwan: Hwɛ ho nsɛm a worenhu wo wɔ afoforo hɔ
Ho Nsɛm Da Adi: Hwɛ hena na obetumi ahu wo ho nsɛm ne wo nsɛm

Mfonini Bammɔ: Si screen capture kwan de notification alert

safetyGuide.redFlagsTitle: Nsɛnkyerɛnne Bɔne a Ɛsɛ Sɛ Wohwɛ
redFlags: Sɛ ɔmfa video frɛyɛ anaa anim di nhyiam akyiri nkrasɛm tenten
Bisa sika, akyɛdeɛ anaa sika ho nsɛm mfiase
Mfonini kakraa anaa mfonini a ɛte sɛ adwumayɛ dodo
Kwati sɛ ɔbɛgye nsɛm pɔtee a ɛfa ne ho so
Hyɛ wo so sɛ monnya nkasaeɛ no amfi app no mu ntɛm ara
De mfonini a ɛyɛ pɛ dodo anaa adwumayɛ di dwuma
safeMeeting: Hyia berɛ nyinaa wɔ baabi a nnipa wɔ ma nhyiam a edi kan
Ka wo nhyehyɛeɛ ne baabi kyerɛ adamfo a wo gye no di
Fa baabi kyɛ app no mu na anya ahobammɔ
Nya wo ankasa kaa kɔ nhyiam no ne san ba
Yɛ video frɛyɛ ansa na woahyia na wo hu wɔn amoa
Gye wo tirim di - sɛ biribi nyɛ yiye a, fi hɔ kɔ
reporting: Bɔ suban bɔne ho amanneɛ ntɛm ara
Sia afodefoɔ a wɔma wo haw
Gye screen shots sɛ adansedie ansa na woasia
Fa emergency nkitahodi di dwuma sɛ ɛho hia a
AI papa hwɛ nkasaeɛ mu hwɛ ahobammɔ bu

troubleshooting.title: Haw a Ɛba Taa no Adwodwo
troubleshooting.subtitle: Ano adwo ntɛm ma tekineko ne app haw
appPerformance: To app no mu na san bue sɛ ɛyɛ brɛoo a
Yi app cache no fi nhyehyɛeɛ mu
Yɛ foforɔ kɔ version foforo so fi App Store
San bue wo mfiri no na ayi memory
matching: Trɛ wo mfeɛ ne kwan tenten mu
Wie wo ho nsɛm de mfonini ne nsɛm pii
San hyehyɛ wo hwehwɛ pɛ wɔ nhyehyɛeɛ mu
Yɛ adwuma pii wɔ app no so na algorithm no ayɛ yiye
messaging: Hwɛ wo internet nkitahodi sɛ nkrasɛm nkɔ
Yɛ app no foforɔ de tiaa fam wɔ nkrasɛm mu
Hwɛ sɛ obi foforo no ayi match no
San bue app no sɛ kyerɛw nkyerɛkyerɛ nnyɛ adwuma
account: San hyehyɛ wo password sɛ wontumi nkɔ mu
Hwɛ wo email ma adansedie links
Ka support ho sɛ premium nneɛma nnyɛ adwuma
Fi mu na san kɔ mu na data no ayɛ baako
contactSupport: Fa nkitahodi krataa a ɛwɔ ase no di dwuma na anya mmoa
Fa screen shots ne haw no ho nsɛm ka ho
Yɛn kuo gye so wɔ nnɔnhwerew 24 mu wɔ adwuma berɛ
Nsɛm a ɛho hia no, frɛ yɛn mmoa telefon
Hwɛ FAQ kane na anya ano adwo ntɛm

termsOfServiceContent.welcomeText: Akwaaba CHARLEY ho! Saa Adwumayɛ Nhyehyɛeɛ yi ("Nhyehyɛeɛ") yɛ mmara mu apam a ɛka wo ne Kronogon, LLC ("CHARLEY", "yɛn", "yɛn deɛ") bom a ɛhwɛ sɛnea wude CHARLEY aware, nkitahodi ne amanfonom platform no bɛdi dwuma, a phone apps, websites ne adwuma ahorow bi ka ho (wɔfrɛ no nyinaa "Adwuma ahorow").
termsOfServiceContent.agreementToTermsText: Sɛ woreyɛ akɔnt, wokɔ anaa wode yɛn Adwuma ahorow no di dwuma a, woka sɛ woakenkan, wote aseɛ na wogye tom sɛ wobɛdi saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi ne yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ akyi. Sɛ wonnye Nhyehyɛeɛ yi bi to mu a, ɛnsɛ sɛ wode yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma.
termsOfServiceContent.ageRequirementsText: Nneɛma soronko hwehwɛ mfeɛ soronko: Aware Nneɛma (MEET): Mfeɛ 18 anaa ɛboro so. Adwumayɛ Nkitahodi (SUITE): Mfeɛ 14 anaa ɛboro so. Mfeɛ dansedie betumi adi hia.
termsOfServiceContent.geographicRestrictionsText: Yɛn Adwuma ahorow yi yɛ ma afodefoɔ a wɔwɔ mmeaeɛ a saa adwuma yi ho mmara wɔ hɔ. Woyɛ odiyifoɔ ma mpɔtam mmara ahohyeso.
termsOfServiceContent.accountRegistrationText: Ɛsɛ sɛ wode nsɛm nokware, foforɔ ne dee ɛwie ma berɛ a woretwerɛ. Wogye tom sɛ wobɛyɛ wo akɔnt nsɛm no foforɔ ntɛm na akyere emu nokware.
termsOfServiceContent.accountSecurityText: Wo nko ara na woyɛ odiyifoɔ ma wo kɔmu nsɛm kokoamoa ne adwuma nyinaa a ɛkɔ so wɔ wo akɔnt ase. Ɛsɛ sɛ woka kyerɛ yɛn ntɛm ara sɛ obi bi kɔ mu a wommaa kwan anaa ahobammɔ bu. Ma wo akɔnt nyɛ ahobammɔ de password a ɛyɛ den na ɛyɛ wo nko ara deɛ ne adie-mmienu adansedie bue.
termsOfServiceContent.oneAccountPerPersonText: Wotumi kura akɔnt baako pɛ. Akɔnt pii yɛ anaa ma afoforo de wo akɔnt di dwuma nni ho kwan na ɛbɛtumi ama wɔayi wo afi mu.
termsOfServiceContent.identityVerificationText: Yɛtumi hwehwɛ amoa adansedie sɛnea yɛpɛ. Nsɛm atoro anaa obi foforo amoa mfira yɛ nea ɛnni ho kwan.
termsOfServiceContent.contentLicenseText: Wokura nsɛm a wode ba no ("Ɔdefoɔ Nsɛm") tumi. Sɛ wode Ɔdefoɔ Nsɛm to gua a, woma CHARLEY wiase kwan a ɛnyɛ wo nko ara, ka biara nni ho, wɔbɛtumi de ama obi foforo na wɔde adi dwuma, kopi, sesa, kyekyɛ, to gua na wɔde wo Ɔdefoɔ Nsɛm ayɛ adwuma wɔ yɛn Adwuma ahorow yɛ ne yɛyɛ papa ho.
termsOfServiceContent.contentStandardsText: Ɔdefoɔ Nsɛm no ɛnsɛ sɛ ɛfa anaa ɛhyɛ nkuran:

contentStandardsList.0: Nsɛm a mmara mma ho kwan, dee ɛyɛ bɔne, dee ɛhyɛ hu anaa dee ɛyɛ nsonsonoeɛ
contentStandardsList.1: Ɔtan kasa, basabasayɛ anaa nsɛm a ɛtaa nnipa gyina wɔn ho nsɛm soronko so
contentStandardsList.2: Gyinamoa nsɛm pefee, adagy anaa nsɛm a ɛhyɛ gyinamoa adwuma nkuran
contentStandardsList.3: Basabasayɛ, wo ho haw anaa dwumadi a ɛyɛ hu
contentStandardsList.4: Spam, bɔne sofitwe, phishing anaa daadaa kwan
contentStandardsList.5: Adwene tumi bu anaa obi foforo nsɛm a wommaa ho kwan
contentStandardsList.6: Obi foforo ho nsɛm a ɛnni ne mmaekwan
contentStandardsList.7: Nsɛm a ɛfa obi foforo amoa anaa nsɛm atoro
contentStandardsList.8: Nsɛm a ɛhyɛ nkuran, aguadi srɛ anaa dawurubɔ a wommaa ho kwan

prohibitedConductList.0: De yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma ma aguadi a wommaa ho kwan
prohibitedConductList.1: Yɛ ho nsɛm atoro anaa sesa wo amoa, mfeɛ anaa wo ho nsɛm
prohibitedConductList.2: Ha, ta akyi, hyɛ hu anaa yɛ afodefoɔ foforo bɔne
prohibitedConductList.3: Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛkɔ afodefoɔ foforo akɔnt anaa wɔn kokoamoa nsɛm mu
prohibitedConductList.4: Fa mfiri nneɛma, bots anaa scripts kɔ yɛn Adwuma ahorow mu
prohibitedConductList.5: Yɛ reverse engineering, decompile anaa bɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛyi source code
prohibitedConductList.6: Bu yɛn Adwuma ahorow ahobammɔ anaa adwumayɛ
prohibitedConductList.7: Bu mmara anaa nhyehyɛeɛ biara a ɛfa ho
prohibitedConductList.8: Boaboa afodefoɔ nsɛm ano ma nkrasɛm a wɔnsrɛeɛ
prohibitedConductList.9: Yɛ sika ho daadaa anaa srɛ sika afodefoɔ foforo

termsOfServiceContent.aiTechnologyText: CHARLEY de nimdeɛ mfiri, mfiri adesua algorithms ne mfiri nhyehyɛeɛ di dwuma ma afodefoɔ suahunu ayɛ papa, a ho nsɛm ne profiles nkamfo, nsɛm hwɛ ne mpatafuo adwuma ka ho.
termsOfServiceContent.matchingDisclaimerText: Yɛn mpatafuo algorithms yɛ nneɛma a ɛboa nkitahodi. Yɛmmma ho kwan sɛ wɔbɛhyia yiye, abusuabɔ a ɛyɛ yiye anaa nea ɛbɛba pɔtee. Afodefoɔ ahobammɔ ne adwene di kan.
termsOfServiceContent.contentModerationText: Yɛde mfiri nhyehyɛeɛ ne nnipa hwɛ nsɛm. Yɛkura tumi sɛ yɛbɛyi nsɛm anaa siassia akɔnt a ɛbu yɛn suhyɛ.
termsOfServiceContent.subscriptionServicesText: CHARLEY tumi de premium nneɛma ma fa gyiegyefoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ. Gyiegyefoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ, a bo ne sikabɔ berɛ ka ho, wɔkyerɛ berɛ a woretɔ.
termsOfServiceContent.autoRenewalText: Gyiegyefoɔ yɛ foforɔ mfiri so gye sɛ wotwa mu ansa na foforɔyɛ da no aba. Wotumi twa mu fa wo akɔnt nhyehyɛeɛ anaa platform no kwan soronko.
termsOfServiceContent.refundsText: Wɔmma sikasane maa gyiegyefoɔ berɛ a wɔamfa anyɛ adwuma, gye sɛ mmara kyerɛ anaa yɛn sikasane nhyehyɛeɛ kyerɛ.
termsOfServiceContent.virtualItemsText: Amoa akyɛdeɛ, boosts anaa digital nneɛma nyinaa nni sika boɔ na wɔmfa nkɔ baabi na wɔmma sikasane.
termsOfServiceContent.privacyPolicyText: Yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ kyerɛ sɛnea yɛboaboa wo nsɛm ano, de di dwuma na yɛbɔ no. Sɛ wode yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma a, wogye yɛn data kwan tom sɛnea yɛakyerɛ wɔ yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ mu.
termsOfServiceContent.locationDataText: Yɛtumi boaboa baabi ho nsɛm ano na yɛde di dwuma ma nneɛma a ɛgyina baabi so. Wotumi di baabi kyɛ ho nhyehyɛeɛ so fa wo mfiri nhyehyɛeɛ.
termsOfServiceContent.communicationsText: Sɛ wode yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma a, wogye tom sɛ wobɛgye nkitahodi afiri yɛn hɔ, a nkamfo nkrasɛm ka ho, a wotumi gyae berɛ biara.
termsOfServiceContent.charleyIpText: Adwuma ahorow, a nsɛm nyinaa, nneɛma, adwumayɛ, aguadi nkyerɛase, adwuma nkyerɛase, logo ne aguadi din ka ho, yɛ Kronogon anaa ne mafoɔ deɛ na copyright, aguadi nkyerɛase, patent ne adwene tumi mmara bɔ ho ban.
termsOfServiceContent.limitedLicenseText: Yɛma wo kwan a wɔato so, a ɛnyɛ wo nko ara, a wɔmfa nkɔ baabi ma wo kɔ yɛn Adwuma ahorow mu na wode di dwuma ma wo ankasa ne adwuma a ɛnyɛ aguadi, fa saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi. Afodefoɔ hwehwɛfoɔ ne ahyehyɛ ananmusifoɔ yɛ wɔn ankasa deɛ sɛ wɔbɛnya ahyehyɛ mmaekwan na wɔahwɛ ahu sɛ wɔdi wɔn adwumawura nhyehyɛeɛ akyi ansa na wɔde yɛn Adwuma ahorow ayɛ adwuma biara.
termsOfServiceContent.copyrightPolicyText: Yɛgye copyright bu ho amanneɛ sɛnea Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) kyerɛ. Sɛ wobɛbɔ copyright bu ho amanneɛ a, ka yɛn ho wɔ admin@kronogon.com.
termsOfServiceContent.thirdPartyLinksText: Yɛn Adwuma ahorow tumi wɔ links a ɛkɔ websites, apps anaa adwuma mmienu. Yɛmmfa mmienu nsɛm, kokoamoa kwan anaa wɔn nhyehyɛeɛ ho asɛm.
termsOfServiceContent.socialMediaIntegrationText: Sɛ woka social media akɔnt a, woma yɛn kwan sɛ yɛbɛkɔ nsɛm bi mu wɔ saa platforms no so sɛnea yɛakyerɛ wɔ yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ mu.
termsOfServiceContent.appStoreTermsText: Sɛ wodownload yɛn app no fa app store a, platform no nhyehyɛeɛ foforo tumi ka ho.
termsOfServiceContent.userSafetyText: Ɛwom sɛ yɛde ahobammɔ nneɛma to hɔ nanso wo ankasa na woyɛ odiyifoɔ ma wo ahobammɔ berɛ a wo ne afodefoɔ foforo redi nkitaho. Hwɛ yiye berɛ a worehyia amannɔne na dwene sɛ wobɛhyia wɔ baabi a nnipa wɔ.
termsOfServiceContent.reportingText: Bɔ suban a ɛyɛ ntwentwɛn, basabasayɛ anaa ahobammɔ ho dadwo ho amanneɛ fa yɛn amanneɛbɔ nneɛma. Yɛhwehwɛ amanneɛ mu na yɛtumi yɛ nea ɛsɛ.
termsOfServiceContent.backgroundChecksText: Yɛnhwɛ afodefoɔ akyiri nsɛm. Wo ankasa na woyɛ odiyifoɔ sɛ wobɛhwɛ sɛ afodefoɔ foforo fata.
termsOfServiceContent.terminationByYouText: Wotumi twa wo akɔnt berɛ biara fa akɔnt nhyehyɛeɛ. Sɛ wotwa a, wo ho nsɛm bɛdum, nanso nsɛm bi bɛtena hɔ sɛnea yɛakyerɛ wɔ yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ mu.
termsOfServiceContent.terminationByUsText: Yɛtumi sia, to so anaa twa wo akɔnt ntɛm ara a yɛmma amanneɛ sɛ wobu saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi, woyɛ biribi a mmara mma ho kwan, anaa nea foforo biara a yɛn nko ara yɛpɛ.
termsOfServiceContent.effectOfTerminationText: Sɛ wotwa a, kwan a yɛama wo nyinaa bɛba awieɛ, na ɛsɛ sɛ wogyae yɛn Adwuma ahorow no di dwuma. Nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ ɛkɔ so wɔ twa akyi no bɛkɔ so.
termsOfServiceContent.asIsBasisText: YƐN ADWUMA AHOROW WƆ HƆ "SƐNEA ƐTEƐ" NE "SƐNEA ƐWƆ HƆ" A AHOTOSO BIARA NNI HO, SƐNEA WƆKYERƐ NO ANAA NKYERƐ NO, A AGUADI PAPA, ADWUMA BIARA HO FE NE AMFIRA NKA HO.
termsOfServiceContent.noGuaranteesText: Yɛmmma ho kwan sɛ yɛn Adwuma ahorow no bɛkɔ so a ɛnsi, ahobammɔ wom anaa mfomso biara nni mu, anaa nea pɔtee bɛba.
termsOfServiceContent.userInteractionsText: Yɛmmfa afodefoɔ suban, nkitaho anaa nsɛm ho asɛm. Afodefoɔ di nkitaho wɔ wɔn prako so.
termsOfServiceContent.damagesLimitationText: MMARA A ƐMA HO KWAN KƐSE MU NO, BAOBAB TECHNOLOGIES, NE MMUSUAKUO, APANYINFOƆ, PANYIN ADWUMAYƐFOƆ, ADWUMAYƐFOƆ NE ANANMUSIFOƆ RENFA ƆSƐEƐ A ƐNYƐ TEFE, NKEKA, SORONKO, AKYIRE, ASOTWE ANAA NHWƐSO A EFI SAA NHYEHYƐEƐ YI ANAA WO YƐN ADWUMA AHOROW DI DWUMA HO HO ASƐM.
termsOfServiceContent.totalLiabilityCapText: Yɛn asɛm ho asɛm dodow a yɛde ma wo ma abisadeɛ nyinaa rentumi nboro $100 anaa sika a wotua maa yɛn wɔ bosome 12 a ɛtwam ansa na abisadeɛ no aba no mu kɛseɛ no.
termsOfServiceContent.userResponsibilityText: Wogye tom sɛ wo aware ne amanfonom nkitaho di dwuma fa online ho wɔ asiane a ɛwom mu, na wogye asɛm ho asɛm dodow ma nkitaho a wo ne afodefoɔ foforo yɛ.
termsOfServiceContent.indemnificationText: Wogye tom sɛ wobɛbɔ Kronogon, ne mmusuakuo, apanyinfoɔ, panyin adwumayɛfoɔ, adwumayɛfoɔ ne ananmusifoɔ ho ban ma abisadeɛ, ɔsɛeɛ, amoa, ka ne ɛka (a lɔyerɛ ka a ɛfata ka ho) a efi: (a) wo yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma; (b) wo Ɔdefoɔ Nsɛm; (c) wo saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi bu; anaa (d) wo obi foforo anaa ahyehyɛ tumi bu.
termsOfServiceContent.mandatoryArbitrationText: Nkɔmmɔbea, abisadeɛ anaa basabasayɛ biara a efi saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi anaa yɛn Adwuma ahorow ho bɛfa atemmu a ɛhyɛ da a American Arbitration Association di so fa ne Afodefoɔ Atemmu Mmara so.
termsOfServiceContent.classActionWaiverText: WO NE BAOBAB TECHNOLOGIES GYE TOM SƐ ƆBIARA TUMI DE ABISADEƐ BA TIAA ƆFOFORO ANKORANKORO MU NA ƐNYƐ SƐ BISAFOƆ ANAA KUO MU NI WƆ KUO ASƐM ANAA ANANMUSINI ASƐM BIARA MU.
termsOfServiceContent.arbitrationLocationText: Atemmu no bɛyɛ wɔ San Francisco, California, anaa baabi foforo a ɔbaanu no bɛpene so.
termsOfServiceContent.exceptionsText: Ɔbiara tumi srɛ asɛnhyɛ wɔ asɛnnibea ma adwene tumi bu anaa nteaseɛ foforo a ɛfata.
termsOfServiceContent.governingLawText: Saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi di California Mantam mmara akyi na wɔkyerɛ mu sɛnea wɔyɛ, a mmara nkɔmmɔbea nsusuwii nka ho. Mmara asɛm biara a ɛmfa atemmu nkɔ so no bɛkɔ federal anaa mantam asɛnnibea a ɛwɔ San Francisco, California nko ara.
termsOfServiceContent.updatesText: Yɛtumi sesa saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi berɛ biara. Nsakraeɛ titire no, yɛbɛka fa yɛn Adwuma ahorow, email anaa kwan foforo a ɛfata so nnafua 30 ansi na ɛmfi ase.
termsOfServiceContent.continuedUseText: Wo yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma a wokɔ so wɔ nsakraeɛ no mfii ase akyi no kyerɛ sɛ wogye Nhyehyɛeɛ foforɔ no tom.
termsOfServiceContent.disagreementText: Sɛ wo ne Nhyehyɛeɛ foforɔ no nnpɛn a, ɛsɛ sɛ wogyae yɛn Adwuma ahorow di dwuma na wotumi twa wo akɔnt.
termsOfServiceContent.entireAgreementText: Saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi, ne yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ, yɛ apam mua a ɛda wo ne CHARLEY ntam fa yɛn Adwuma ahorow ho.
termsOfServiceContent.severabilityText: Sɛ wɔbu sɛ saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi fa bi nyɛ adwuma a, nea ɛka ho no bɛkɔ so ayɛ adwuma.
termsOfServiceContent.noWaiverText: Sɛ yɛamfa yɛn tumi anaa nhyehyɛeɛ bi anni dwuma a, ɛnkyerɛ sɛ yɛagyae saa tumi anaa nhyehyɛeɛ no.
termsOfServiceContent.assignmentText: Wontumi mfa saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi mma obi anaa mfa nkɔ baabi a yɛankyerɛw ama. Yɛtumi de saa Nhyehyɛeɛ yi ma obi a biribiara nsiw kwan.
termsOfServiceContent.forceMajeureText: Yɛmmfa ntwentwɛn anaa ɔhaw a efi nneɛma a yɛntumi nni so ho asɛm.
termsOfServiceContent.supportContact: Ma afodefoɔ mmoa, ahobammɔ ho dadwo anaa bu ho amanneɛbɔ a, fa app no mmoa nneɛma anaa email ka yɛn ho wɔ support@kronogon.com.
termsOfServiceContent.finalAcknowledgment: SƐ WODE CHARLEY DI DWUMA A, WOAGYINA MU SƐ WOAKENKAN, WOATE ASEƐ NA WOAGYE TOM SƐ SAA DI DWUMA NHYEHYƐEƐ YI BƐKYEKYERE WO.

auth.accountSecurityText: Wo akɔnt ho nsɛm kokoamoa ne dwuma biara a ɛyɛ wɔ wo akɔnt ase no hwɛ yɛ wo asɛdeɛ. Wugye tom sɛ wobɛka akyerɛ yɛn ntɛm ara sɛ obi de wo akɔnt yɛ biribi a womaa ho kwan anaa ahobammɔ bu biara.

auth.userConductItem1: Nsɛm a ɛnyɛ nokware, nnaadaa anaa nea ɛma nipa ani da ho twa
auth.userConductItem2: Obi ha, yɛ no bɔne anaa ka no

auth.contentText: Nsɛm a wode to hɔ a mfoni, nkrasɛm ne profile ho nsɛm ka ho no hwɛ yɛ wo nko ara asɛdeɛ. Womaa CHARLEY kwan a ɛnyɛ wo nko ara, wobɛtumi de ama foforɔ, wobɛtumi de gye sika a ɛnyɛ, na wiase nyinaa kwan ma wo nsɛm no so dwuma yɛ, kyɛ, sesa, yɛ, twe, da adi, kyerɛ ase ne fo nneɛma foforɔ yɛ.
auth.privacyText: Wo kokoamoa ho hia ma yɛn. Yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ kyerɛ sɛnea yɛboa wo ankasa ho nsɛm ano, yɛ ho adwuma ne yɛbɔ ho ban. Yɛn adwuma de di dwuma a, wugye yɛn data ho adwumayɛ a yɛakyerɛ wɔ yɛn Kokoamoa Nhyehyɛeɛ mu no tom.
auth.terminationText: CHARLEY wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔbɛgyae anaa twa wo akɔnt berɛ biara sɛ wobu saa nhyehyɛeɛ yi so anaa botaeɛ foforɔ biara nti.
auth.changesText: Yɛbɛtumi asesa saa Nhyehyɛeɛ Ahorow yi berɛ ne berɛ mu. Wo asɛdeɛ ne sɛ wobɛsan ahwɛ saa nhyehyɛeɛ yi berɛ biara. Adwuma no di dwuma a ɛkɔ so kyerɛ sɛ wogye nsakraeɛ biara tom.
auth.liabilityText: CHARLEY ma sɛnea ɛteɛ ne sɛnea ɛwɔ hɔ. Yɛmma biribiara ho bɔhyɛ, a ɛda adi anaa a ɛhyɛ mu, fa yɛn adwuma ahotoso, ɛwɔ hɔ anaa pɛpɛɛpɛ ho.
auth.contactText: Sɛ wobɛ abisadeɛ biara wɔ saa Nhyehyɛeɛ Ahorow yi ho a, yɛn nkitaho wɔ admin@kronogon.com.

kwame.description: Amammerɛ ne adwuma akwankyerɛfo foforo a ɔte wo amanne pɔtee ase na ɔka wo ho asɛm kyerɛ wo. Sɛnea AI aboafo foforɔ nte no, KWAME te wo amammerɛ gyidie ase na ɔma akwankyerɛ soronko wɔ aware, adwuma netwɔkinŋ, ne nnipakuw nkitahodi ho. Sunsum nhwehwɛmu ne mfoni nsakrae tumi ahorow de, KWAME ma nkɔmmɔdie mu nteaseɛ dɔ na ɔboa wo ma woda wo ho adi yiye wɔ berɛ a wodi wo amammerɛ ne abusua gyidie ni.
